raw_data.raw_string: Name of donor: (1) Results UK (2) Indian GovernmentAddress of donor: (1) 31-33 Bondway, London SW8 1SJ (2) India House, Aldwych, London WC2B 4NAEstimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): (1) Per diems of £1,397.28 in total, paid for 3-8 January 2018 at UK Government daily subsistence rates. (2) Flights with a value of £5,990.51, plus hospitality, transport and accommodation worth £1,000, £6,990.51 in total.Destination of visit: New Delhi, IndiaDates of visit: 2-13 January 2018Purpose of visit: (1) 3-8 January 2018, meeting with Indian Politicians and NGOs regarding TB and the India TB Caucus Co-chairs on behalf of and with Results UK. (2) 8-10 January 2018, attending the PIO Parliamentarians Conference, which brings together Parliamentarians of Indian origin from across the world to network and discuss global and parliamentary issues.(Registered 05 February 2018; updated 13 February 2018)
